sentence: Now, they say, it is time for Mr. Biden to focus not only on his own achievements, but also on how the Republican Party threatens to reverse those efforts if it returns to power on Capitol Hill — something that has not been at the center of his presidency so far.” JAN. 6 AND ITS AFTERMATH JORDAN SNUBS JAN. 6 PANEL — Rep. JIM JORDAN (R-Ohio) is refusing the Jan. 6 committee’s request for an interview, calling the ask an “unprecedented and inappropriate demand.” In a letter to Chair BENNIE THOMPSON (D-Miss.)
